MetaData.MetaDataItem: The EVA LOGIK ZW97 is a Z-wave enabled 15A receptacle designed for using most residential lighting and motor applications. It's compatible with LED, halogen, incandescent, xenon, fluorescent, and compact flourescent bulbs.Total load capacity is 15A(1800W) Resistive.
Press the button three times quickly.
Press the button three times quickly.
Press the button twice quickly then hold for at least 10 seconds.

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial creation using Inovelli NZW97 as template as this device appears to be a rebrand, still reporting the Inovelli manufacturer code.

Value.label: LED Indicator Control
Value.Help: Choose if you want the LED indicator to turn on when switch is on or off or disable completely.

Item.label: LED on when switch is off
LED on when switch is on

Value.label: Automatically turn channel 1 off after interval
Value.Help: Automatically turn channel 1 off after this many minutes. 0 is disabled.

Value.label: Automatically turn channel 2 off after interval
Value.Help: Automatically turn channel 2 off after this many minutes. 0 is disabled.

Value.label: Automatically turn channel 1 on after interval
Value.Help: Automatically turn channel 1 on after this many minutes. 0 is disabled.

Value.label: Automatically turn channel 2 on after interval
Value.Help: Automatically turn channel 2 on after this many minutes. 0 is disabled.

Value.label: Switch state after power failure
Value.Help: Choose the state of the outlets after power is lost and restored.
